about: Hey there! I'm a senior student with a deep passion for game development. I love creating immersive experiences that engage players and tell compelling stories.

I enjoy working with various game engines and programming languages to bring creative gameplay mechanics to life. From prototyping to polishing, I'm driven by the challenge of making games that are both fun and memorable.
Currently focusing on indie game development and gameplay programming, I'm always learning new techniques and exploring innovative ways to enhance player experience.
